projects.name: Task Management
projects.description: Developed a task manager application designed for Admin and Employee roles. Admin features include task assignment, employee management, and comprehensive data viewing. Employees can update task statuses and view assigned task details. Prioritized user experience with an intuitive interface and secure authentication.

projects.name: CGPA-Calculator
projects.description: Made a CGPA calculator where students can put in their course credits. It works for any college or department, figuring out CGPA with the entered info. Makes things easier by providing a common way to calculate CGPA in different schools. Users just put in their course credits and grades to get their CGPA.

projects.name: WhatsApp UI
projects.description: Design a WhatsApp-like interface for chatting. Enable users to communicate through text chats. Include features for sharing status updates and engaging in video or audio calls.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Designed and developed a dynamic and responsive personal website to showcase my skill set. Visually appealing and responsive interface with HTML and CSS. Incorporated interactive features to boost user engagement. Demonstrated proficiency in creating both visually attractive and functional web projects.

experiences.description: Developed a comprehensive Bank Employee Management System over 8 weeks. Took on the role of Web Developer, utilizing PHP and Laravel. Conducted research and analysis, incorporating user interviews and competitor insights.

Strengthened web development skills by building responsive applications with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Proficient in creating visually appealing, user-friendly interfaces, showcasing a solid foundation in design and development.
